original_text: If your axe is not sharp, you will need to be very strong to use it. If you are wise, you will make the axe's edge sharp again. That is how wisdom helps you to do things well. If your axe is not sharp, you will need to be very strong to use it. If you are wise, you will make the axe's edge sharp again. That is how wisdom helps you to do things well. If your axe is not sharp,
korean_text: 철 연장이 무디어졌는데도 날을 갈지 아니하면 힘이 더 드느니라 오직 지혜는 성공하기에 유익하니라

sentences.original_text: If your axe is not sharp
you will need to be very strong to use it
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그것을 사용하기 위해 매우 강해져야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: you will make the axe's edge sharp again
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 도끼의 날을 다시 날카롭게 만들 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is how wisdom helps you to do things well
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 지혜가 당신이 일을 잘하도록 돕는 방법입니다
